post.text: Crooked Hillary Clinton is not fit to be our next president!

comment.author: Morgan
comment.text: I have suspected this all week. I asked my sister, a Nero-ICU Nurse, about HiLIARY's bizarre behaviors and my sister suspects effects of Mini-Strokes - if it's physical. I suspect Socio-pathetic Meltdown. I would love for Ben Carson to give a professional opinion.

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: I have a genetic disease that attacks my brain I've had seizures, metabolic strokes and migraine It apparent that she has an neurological disorder or disease
